class_notes:
In this one credit senior seminar, teams of BBA students will develop an integrated marketing strategy to assist Emory University's COVID-19 Response and Recovery Team in understanding how to best influence the behaviors of 18-24 year-olds ahead of returning to campus in Fall 2021.  Students will be required to attend a virtual project kickoff and deliver a virtual presentation to the client at the end of the experience. Enrollment is limited to students who have completed one semester in BBA Program and BUS 365. This seminar will count for one credit of senior seminar towards BBA graduation requirements.


Mandatory class meetings are as follows; students are required to attend both sessions in their entirety to receive credit for this course:
Project Kickoff/Client Introductions: Friday, May 21 from 12:30pm to 4:30pm ET
Project Presentations: Wednesday, June 23 from 12:30pm to 3:30pm ET
prerequisites: BUS 365 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
